comments.content:
This is a piece of text as an image ex a website. I need to replicate the font in order to correct spelling errors in other, similar, text items.

Because the original is a .jpg image, I cannot identify the text using the website source code.

Thank you.

Thanks you very much. This is most helpful.

Martin
